mapper.sql: id, sportid, contestantid, presoloscore, soloscore, finalscore, taketime
mapper.select: select * from score_table where taketime=#{currentime} and sportid=#{sportid} and contestantid=#{contestantid}
mapper.insert: insert into score_table (id, sportid, contestantid, presoloscore, soloscore, finalscore, taketime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contestantid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{presoloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{soloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{finalscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{taketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into score_table
id,
sportid,
contestantid,
presoloscore,
soloscore,
finalscore,
taketime,

mapper.update:
update score_table
sportid = #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contestantid = #{contestantid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
presoloscore = #{presoloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
soloscore = #{soloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
finalscore = #{finalscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
taketime = #{taketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update score_table set sportid = #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contestantid = #{contestantid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, presoloscore = #{presoloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, soloscore = #{soloscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, finalscore = #{finalscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, taketime = #{taketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
